pageContext.claim: “Now, in the courts and the court system, we're not approving new judges over the last year. We're not going to approve them. And Bob Lighthizer is working very hard on that.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a nonsensical statement. Neither country involved in a WTO case can have a judge involved in the case. So there are no majorities for or against. Moreover, The United States has won about 90 percent of cases it brought to the WTO since 1995.
